name: Undead Uprising
location: The settlement with the most cemeteries or (if no settlements have cemeteries) the largest settlement
description: A malign force, be it a sinister curse, a nefarious necromancer, or an invasion of ghouls, vampires, or other undead-creating monsters, causes the dead to rise from their graves and threaten the settlement.

success.msg: The undead are temporarily contained with little physical damage to your settlement, but the populace still grow fearful each night. @gain1Unrest

failure.msg:
The undead prey upon your citizens! @gain1d4Unrest and increase a Ruin of your choice by 1
  • @gain1Corruption
  • @gain1Crime
  • @gain1Decay
  • @gain1Strife

criticalFailure.msg:
The undead gain the advantage and bring disaster. @gain2d4Unrest, increase all Ruins by 1
  • @gain1Corruption
  • @gain1Crime
  • @gain1Decay
  • @gain1Strife
and one non-cemetery lot in your settlement (chosen by the players) is reduced to rubble.
